sections.title: About me
sections.content: I am a full stack software engineer with a background in business and finance advisory. My experience includes working in software engineering, business management, and as a workshop coordinator. I'm known for my teamwork, ability to share experiences, and my commitment to achieving personal and organisational goals.

experiences.description: Engaged in full-time software engineering tasks, contributing to various projects in a hybrid work setting.
Working as a full-time software engineer, focusing on diverse aspects of software development.
Developing foundational skills in software engineering, contributing to various projects.

experiences.location: Wetherill Park, New South Wales, Australia
experiences.description: Coordinated the cylinder repair team, managed day-to-day tasks, projects, and workshop planning for high-quality services in hydraulic projects, refurbishment, and repairs.

Served as a sales consultant for IT solutions, assisting businesses to find optimal IT solutions, managing customer portfolios, and overseeing projects in outsourcing, software factory, IoT, and digital marketing.
Worked as a wealth advisor, managing retirement plans, investment funds, and insurance strategies for high net-worth individuals.
Focused on sales of bank products and services, advising customers on investment funds and savings, and managing private retirement plans.
Managed financial operations, payments, money exchange, and auditing of treasury controls.

sections.title: Education
sections.content: I hold a Software Engineering Immersive certification from General Assembly, a Master of Business Administration from Kaplan, and a Bachelor of Business Administration with IT from FIAP.
